titles.title: Pennsylvania National Forest Improvement Act of 2002
To authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to convey certain lands and improvements associated with the National Forest System in the State of Pennsylvania, and for other purposes.

bill.summary: 6/6/2002--Introduced. Pennsylvania National Forest Improvement Act of 2002 - Authorizes the Secretary of Agriculture to: (1) sell or exchange specified National Forest System lands and administrative sites in Pennsylvania; (2) convey the Sheffield Ranger District Headquarters to the Warren County Development Association, Warren County, Pennsylvania; and (3) convey the Marienville ranger residence to the Marienville Volunteer Fire Department, Forest County, Pennsylvania.
